title: The Walking Dead: A New Frontier
description:
When family is all you have leftâ€¦how far will you go to protect it? After society was ripped apart by undead hands, pockets of civilization emerge from the chaos. But at what cost? Can the living be trusted on this new frontier? Chrono Trigger
As Javier, a young man determined to find the family taken from him, you meet a young girl who has experienced her own unimaginable loss. Her name is Clementine, and your fates are bound together in a story where every choice you make could be your last.

system_requirements.Additional Notes: Not supported on Intel integrated graphics
